## WebviewerDBStore.storeIcon() method

Store specific icon for the given domain name in Base64 string.

**Signature:**

```typescript
storeIcon(domain: string, source?: string): Promise<string | null>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

domain

</td><td>

string

</td><td>

Domain name only, e.g. "obsidian.md".

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

source

</td><td>

string

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Source url of the icon, e.g. "https://obsidian.md/favicon.ico".

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string \| null&gt;

Icon in Base64 encoded string.
